short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Identifies the physical location of a website's server

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a scrappy-little-app, built entirely via Claude, that uses a browser extension to show the approximate location of the ISP hosting a website
